title: "Committee Correspondence"
categories:
    - policy
    - S3
---

Correspondence from Parliament Committees are stored, retained and publicly available.

As an example, here is the [publication page](https://committees.parliament.uk/committee/127/public-accounts-committee/publications/) of the Public Accounts Committee, and their [Correspondence](https://committees.parliament.uk/committee/127/public-accounts-committee/publications/3/correspondence/).

This is [available through an API.](https://committees-api.parliament.uk/index.html)

**An extract of this correspondence is available through S3 as pac-correspondence**
